derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from an alteration of self + edge, on the pattern of early modern Dutch selfegghe. The geological term dates from the 1930s

means.word_mean: 1. border consisting of an ornamental fringe at either end of an oriental carpet
2. the edge of a fabric that is woven so that it will not ravel or fray
